official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow taxpayers to designate that a portion of their income tax refunds be retained by the United States for use for certain public purposes.
subjects: Federal aid to day care centers
Federal aid to the arts and humanities

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a taxpayer to designate that one or more specified public programs be paid a specified portion (not less than one dollar) of any overpayment of income tax.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow taxpayers to designate that a portion of their income tax refunds be retained by the United States for use for certain public purposes.
